meanings.definition: A dark brown to black mica mineral commonly found in igneous and metamorphic rocks.
meanings.sent1: The geologist studied the biotites under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: Miners discovered biotites in the rocky terrain.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel mistook biotites for shiny acorns.
meanings.sent4: The night sky sparkled like a bed of biotites.
meanings.sent5: The biotites glistened in the sunlight, revealing their dark beauty.
